name: songcheat-demos
description: Demo CLI utilities and jQuery apps using songcheat-core

scripts.clean: rm -f dist/* && rm -f samples/*.json && rm -f samples/*.lyrics && rm -f samples/*.log
scripts.build: npm run clean && node cli/cc --output dist/samples.json samples/*.txt && npm run lint && rollup -c
scripts.uglify: npm run uglify.umd && npm run uglify.esm
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run uglify

author: Louis Antoine-Moussiaux
